title: Nine injured in bus-car collision
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Nine people were injured in a road accident in the Marawila area on the Colombo-Chilaw main road yesterday (18).
Police stated that the accident occurred when a passenger bus collided with a car.
The person who was driving the car, identified as a doctor, was seriously injured in the accident that took place last night.
He is currently being treated at the Intensive Care Unit of the Marawila Hospital, Police said.
